greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = Fibonacci(6n + 3).
link: Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (18,-1).
Index entries for sequences related to Chebyshev polynomials.
formula: a(n) = 2*(S(n, 18) - S(n-1, 18)), n >= 0, with the Chebyshev S-polynomials S(n-1, 18) = A049660(n). (See the g.f.) - _Wolfdieter Lang_, Jul 10 2018
results.author: _Artur Jasinski_, Oct 28 2007
ext: Index in definition and offset corrected by _R. J. Mathar_, Apr 17 2011
